document.full_text: the justice department has decided to pursue an in-depth investigation of at&t's plan to buy of t-mobile usa, according to a source familiar with the deal.
document.title: doj probe of at&t, t-mobile deal deepens: source
lines_and_colors: the justice department has decided to pursue an in-depth investigation of at&t's plan to buy of t-mobile usa, according to a source familiar with the deal.
